E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 4/2/1989
Subject: Joel Camarena failed learning new position
Joel Camarena doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Catcher.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Bill Reinoso
Dear Sir,
Bill Reinoso has nothing more to prove at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
He has an AVG of .495 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Timothy Drain
Dear Sir,
Timothy Drain has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .393 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .318, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Tom Meagher
